item.description:
Old Wethersfield 5K & 10 K
Sunday, August 29, 2010
Start Time: 8:30 AM

Corner of Garden and State Streets
Wethersfield, CT

A beautiful course along the historic streets of Old Wethersfield.

Web Site Address:
http://www.hartfordma...

___________________________________________________________________________

Online registration will close on Tuesday, August 24, 2010 at 11 a.m.
Walk-in registration is available on race day beginning at 7:00 am.

Pay close attention to Race Costs (If commit early, it's more reasonable):

Until Aug 1
- Adult 5K - $23
- Adult 10K - $33
-Student 5K - $18
-Student 10K - $28

Aug 2 till Aug 24
- Adult 5k - $28
- Adult 10k - $38
-Student 5k - $23
-Student 10k - $33

Aug 25 till Race Day
- Adult 5k - $30
- Adult 10k - $40
-Student 5k - $25
-Student 10k $35
________________________________________________________________

Directions
Take I-91 to Exit 26 (Old Wethersfield).
Follow signs to Department of Motor Vehicles.

Parking
Park in Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) parking lot
at 60 State Street, Wethersfield.

Course Maps:
http://www.hartfordma...
item.name: Old Wethersfield 5K & 10K
